reviews.title: Great stay at Wanaka Homestead
reviews.text: We had a wonderful stay here. The lake is an easy walk across the street and we were able to walk into town for dinner. Our hosts were extremely helpful, including providing ice packs when my husband hurt his back. Thoroughly enjoyed our visit.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Wanaka Homestead is a nice homely lodge which is located quite centrally to the main attractions.
reviews.title: Convenient Location, Cute Lodge

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: They were very helpful in organizing and/or recommending things to do or see in Wanaka (which in itself is a really beautiful place)!
reviews.title: Fabulous Place to Stay with a Homely Feel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room was also cozy and breakfast selection plentiful. Breakfast is also a great opportunity to mingle with other guests.
reviews.title: Loved this place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just recently stayed three nights at the Wanaka Homestead Lodge. Our room was in the main lodge. Our room for the first night was the South room which was nice but being quite a bit taller than average I found the sloping ceiling a bit restrictive. Lisa kindly arranged to move us to the North room for the next two nights which was wonderful. The room was considerably bigger with a view out to the garden and lots of light.
reviews.title: Great B&B
